publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1968 Elaine Smith: Breastfeeding etc. (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Breastfeeding etc. (Scotland) Bill be passed.
S2M-1968 Elaine Smith: Breastfeeding etc. (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Breastfeeding etc. (Scotland) Bill be passed.
S2M-1968 Breastfeeding etc. (Scotland) Bill (lodged on 5 November 2004) Susan Deacon*
